Florida Elite Golf Card
FL Elite Card Reservations
Buy Online
Catering Events
Download Catering Menu
Turn your upcoming wedding or special event into a relaxing golf getaway for the entire group with excellent lodging and accommodations, top-notch golfing facilities, and friendly staff.
Facilities and Capacity
Orange County National Golf Center and Lodge is home to a wide range of golfing facilities, courses, lodging, and event spaces. The 22,000-square-foot clubhouse is the perfect space for any special event, including wedding ceremonies and receptions, corporate gatherings, parties, bridal showers, and more. The manicured lawn with a white pergola looks out onto one of our championship golf courses, creating a picturesque backdrop for a lovely wedding ceremony. For indoor celebrations, Orange County National features an open-room clubhouse that is fit for up to 250 guests. Not only is this venue perfect for special events of all kinds, but it has everything you need to keep your guests entertained for the entire stay. The on-site lodge is perfect for those who are traveling and looking for a close, affordable lodging option. With over 30 rooms and two hospitality suites, the lodge can accommodate both large and small groups. The hospitality suites are of the highest quality, furnished with seating areas, bathrooms, and full-sized refrigerators to make your stay even more comfortable.
Click
HERE
to learn more about our on-site lodge.
Services Offered
Orange County National Golf Center and Lodge has a great selection of event services that will help to make your experience even more amazing. Aside from the above mentioned lodging accommodations and amenities, there are also event planning services, catering and bar options, rental items, and more. The rental items available for use include things like chairs, tables, dance floors, decor, linens, and more. Take advantage of these items and allow them to enhance your event to their fullest capabilities. Some of the other wonderful event services include, but are not limited to, the following:
Setup/cleanup
Get ready rooms
Liability insurance
Servers
Bartenders
Tastings
Catering Request

Meeting & Corporate Events
Orange County National is the perfect venue for your next business meeting! Our private Ritson Room can accommodate a maximum of 40 people and has a variety of functional floor plans for every type of meeting. Our Executive Board Room can accommodate a maximum of 20 people and comes equipped with conference dial in, 2 Flat Screen TVs with A/V Connectivity, a Wet Bar with a Mini Fridge, and Coffee Maker.
We have standard menu options or can even customize a menu to your preferences. Our experienced staff will work with you every step of the way to ensure a successful day!
Multiple floor plan options
Standard or customizable menus
Complimentary parking
Complimentary wireless internet
In house catering
Full-service bar
More than your neighborhood Golf Course
Orange County National is the perfect setting for your special occasion! Whether you picture an intimate gathering or grand affair, Orange County National has all the necessities to make your event unforgettable. From floor plans to menus, centerpieces, and decor, to any needs you may have, our experienced staff will work to provide a customized service to ensure your celebration is just as you imagine, and more!
Indoor and outdoor locations
Scenic views for pictures
Standard or customizable menus
Complimentary parking
Complimentary wireless internet
In house catering
Full-service bar
